metadata.synopsis: Three halfling stand near a cart that was once full to the brim with fresh food and supplies. Other refugees swarmed it in a panic and stuffed their pockets - breaking the cart in the process. The halflings got there too later, and now stand next to the wreckage of the cart.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 85; 64; -55- Talk to the female halfling.

0.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
0.text: We got here first, friend. You're welcome to whatever scraps we leave behind.
0.context: NodeContext: Sharp tone, thinks the player might be trying to muscle in on the supplies they found.

1.speaker: Zeffy Softbluff
1.text: You can root through the cart when we're done.
1.context: NodeContext: Sharp tone, thinks the player might be trying to muscle in on the supplies they found.
